708140f-a.text:
Third Avenue, east side, north from East 97th Street, showing tenements interspersed with clearances. The latter are a direct result of Mayor La Guardia's & Venement House Commissioner Langdon Post's campaign for alum clearance. No. 2 is northward from the middle of the 97th - 98th Street block and shows across a corner clearance (S.E. corner) the buildings north of 98th Street. Note the Third Avenue "K.I." overhead and casting dense shadows over the street level.
The station thereof is at 90th Street.
September 13, 1938
Views 1 and 2
P.L. Sperr
